ygData.subject: RE: Level 43 Song
ygData.msgSnippet: LOL, if you put it in this way, they will do an emergency server shutdown and patch to fix the exploit .  If you just ask for it to be fixed and not mention
ygData.messageBody:
LOL, if you put it in this way, they will do an emergency server shutdown
and patch to fix the 'exploit'. If you just ask for it to be fixed and not
mention this it will take weeks :)

Rokenn Swiftsong - Karana server
Master Craftsmen of Societus Argenti


>From: Greg Gillan <GGillan@...>
>Reply-To: eqbards@onelist.com
>To: "'eqbards@onelist.com'" <eqbards@onelist.com>
>Subject: RE: [eqbards] Level 43 Song
>Date: Fri, 1 Oct 1999 16:10:55 -0400
>
>From: Greg Gillan <GGillan@...>
>
>Well, was just looking for confimation first. I can pretty much guarantee
>that they'd fix this. Here's why: losing a battle? pretty sure that
>you're going to die? Fire up the song and kill yourself - this way you
>have
>been killed by a PC and don't lose experience. I discovered this by
>mistake
>by trying to finish off a kobold with this song when we were both at about
>a
>bubble of life.
>
>
>Elwyn
>
